snippet.title: Nintendo 64 Longplay [024] Forsaken
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

Here's a game that was so notoriously hard, the coders had to release a patch to make it easier! On the PC, of course. This is the console version of it, which is actually easier and shorter (there is a super hard mode on the PC version that is missing here).

depending on your performance in the first level, you will get a different path:

00:04:34 Easy path
01:06:26 Medium path
01:54:33 Hard path -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
